title: Editor's Choice Pictures
text:
Corey Lewandowski, U.S. President Donald Trump's former campaign manager and close confidant, is given a copy of the Mueller Report as he testifies before the U.S. House Judiciary Committee's first hearing of their impeachment investigation on...more

Corey Lewandowski, U.S. President Donald Trump's former campaign manager and close confidant, is given a copy of the Mueller Report as he testifies before the U.S. House Judiciary Committee's first hearing of their impeachment investigation on Capitol Hill in Washington. REUTERS/Joshua Roberts

description: An aerial view shows a deforested plot of the Amazon near Porto Velho, Rondonia State, Brazil. REUTERS/Bruno Kelly
